1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: (Abdullah) İbn-i Abbas (Radiyallahu anhuma)'den: şöyle söylemiştir: Resulullah (Sallallahu Aleyhi ve Sellem) bize abdest isbağını emretti

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي إِسْبَاغِ الْوُضُوءِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning performing ablution properly
